divs: Sighting DetailsWhile I was watching several neighborhood fireworks to the west I observed a large red bright light flying at a high altitude at a slow speed from south to north. I watched it for about 3 minutes and then it disappeared. The light pulsed at time but never blinked and no other lights were observed at the time. The color was similar to an object I saw in January of this year however it was stationary over a shopping plaza , it was smaller and slowly disappeared after about 2 minutes of watching it with a couple of people. They also told me they saw a V formation of the same lights over the ocean on New Years Eve as well.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Indian Harbour Beach
There were no other sightings in Indian Harbour Beach on or around July 4th 2012
Summary: Red light seen during 4th of July fireworks
